description: Tempeh is a great way to get plant-based protein in this spicy curry inspired veggie traybake.
name: Sweet Potato & Tempeh Traybake Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2 large red onion, peeled and chopped

recipeInstructions.text: Pre-heat the oven to 180°C/160°C fan-forced. Place the paste ingredients, half the lime and half the coriander (including stalks) in a food pressor and blend to a smooth curry paste.
Pour this mix into a large bowl and toss in the red onion, capsicums, cauliflower, sweet potato and tempeh, mix well to coat and leave to marinate for 15 minutes.
Spoon the vegetable mix into a large baking tray and roast for 15 minutes. Remove from the oven and add the tempeh slices and roast for 30 minutes.
Remove from the oven, scatter with fresh coriander, squeeze over the remaining lime and serve.
